text: Niścaẏa tōmālōkē āmāra ōcarata niḥsaṅga arasthāta āhichā, yidaraē āmi tōmālōkaka prathamabāra sr̥ṣṭi karaichilō, ārau āmi tōmālōkaka yi pradāna karaichilō sēẏā tōmālōkē nijara pichaphālē ērai thai āhichā. Tōmālōkē yisakalaka tōmālōkara bābē (āllāhara lagata) anśī buli bhāraichilā, sē'i chupāraichakāraī bilākō dēkhuna tōmālōkara lagata nā'i. Tōmālōkara mājara samparka niścaẏa bicchinna haichē ārau tōmālōkē yiṭō dhāraṇā karaichilā sē'iṭō'ō tōmālōkara paraā hēraā'i gaichē
